attributes.action: Stop sky charging £15.00 for Premier League matches.
attributes.additional_details: I think it is unfair that people have to pay £15 to watch their team when they already pay for Sky Sports.
attributes.background: Stop Sky from charging £15.00 to watch football if you already have sky sports.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the football authorities.
